help.short: The name of the hybrid machine.
The name of the run command.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="statuses">
<prop type="array" name="parameters" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array<@RunCommandInputParameter_read>" name="protectedParameters" identifiers="name">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the hybrid machine.
The name of the run command.
The name of the hybrid machine.
The name of the run command.
The geo-location where the resource lives
Resource tags.
Specifies the commandId of predefined built-in script.
Specifies the script content to be executed on the machine.
Specifies the script download location. It can be either SAS URI of an Azure storage blob with read access or public URI.

User-assigned managed identity that has access to scriptUri in case of Azure storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure the Azure storage blob exists, and managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Reader' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged.
Client Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ObjectId should not be used if this is provided.
Object Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ClientId should not be used if this is provided.

<prop type="array" name="parameters" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array<@RunCommandInputParameter_read>" name="protectedParameters" identifiers="name">

command.name: update

help.short: The name of the hybrid machine.
The name of the run command.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$runCommandProperties.properties.parameters" options="parameters" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@RunCommandInputParameter_update>" var="$runCommandProperties.properties.protectedParameters" options="protected-parameters" group="Properties">

help.short: Resource tags.
Specifies the commandId of predefined built-in script.
Specifies the script content to be executed on the machine.
Specifies the script download location. It can be either SAS URI of an Azure storage blob with read access or public URI.

User-assigned managed identity that has access to scriptUri in case of Azure storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure the Azure storage blob exists, and managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Reader' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged.
Client Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ObjectId should not be used if this is provided.
Object Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ClientId should not be used if this is provided.
